section.title: View
section.para:
The view resource is meant to provide the user a turn-key view that may be used as is throughout the application. The view provided will be setup with the following:
Majisti's application library views scripts
Majisti and MajistiX view helpers added to the pluginloader
ZendX JQuery view helpers added to the pluginloader
The Zend_View registry key will be setup with that view
The doctype will be set to XHTML1.0 STRICT.

section.para: When in development environment, the JQuery URL used by default will be /majisti/public/jquery/jquery.js. The URL may be overriden in the resources configuration file by setting the variable below: resources.view.jquery.url = BASE_URL "/foo/bar"

Once in production environment, the JQuery URL should be set to the Google API's ajax library for better loading time (you know Google is in about the entire planet's cache don't you?). This provides significant performance gain and increased end-user happiness. Since Majisti strives to make developpers and end-users happy, the default production JQuery URL is already set to Google's JQuery library. No need to change anything.

If that does not make you happy enough, oh do not worry, you may change it as many times as you like! Simply change JQuery's URL in the resources config file: resources.view.jquery.url = "http://www.yourhappierdomain.com"
